title: Introducing GPT-5 for developers
raw_excerpt: Introducing GPT-5 in our API platform—offering high reasoning performance, new controls for devs, and best-in-class results on real coding tasks.
raw_body: Introducing GPT-5 in our API platform—offering high reasoning performance, new controls for devs, and best-in-class results on real coding tasks.
speedrun: GPT-5 is now available on the API platform for developers.
why_it_matters: Enhances coding tasks with improved reasoning performance.
Provides developers with new controls for better integration.

lenses.eli12: GPT-5 is a new tool for developers. It helps them code better and faster.
lenses.pm: Developers are the primary users of GPT-5. It stands out due to its advanced reasoning capabilities, but competition exists. Risks include potential misuse or over-reliance on AI.
lenses.engineer: GPT-5 uses advanced algorithms for coding tasks. Data sources and training methods are not specified. Constraints may include performance limits in complex scenarios.
